players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "Diana, your claim is serious. Bob, how do you respond to Diana's accusation?"
You: "I am not the mafioso. Diana's accusation is baseless and seems like an attempt to mislead us. Charlie, do you have any evidence to support or refute Diana's claim?"
Diana: "I investigated Bob and he is mafioso. Charlie, trust me - we must vote Bob out to win."
Charlie: "Bob's silence is suspicious, but Diana's claim is also quite bold without evidence shown. Let's not rush—Bob, can you say more to defend yourself before we vote?"
